Hi!
I'm trying to figure out Quest and I can't seem to remove the "a" from the starting text. I give the name of a the first room then I add a bit to the "You are in..." sentence and when I start the game it writes down my sentence then it put at the end an "a" and the room name and it doesn't fit always to have an "a" there, but I don't know how to change it or remove it.  I checked out some games here and I didn't see it so I take it, it can be removed or changed.

Posts.EditableText: Untick the option "Use default prefix" on the room. This will then give you some boxes where you can type another word to be used instead of "a"; or you can leave it blank if you don't want any word at all.
